comment: /**  * Restores state that was previously snapshotted from the provided parameters. Typically the parameters are state  * handles from which the old state is read.  *  * @param state the old state to restore.  */
code: /**  * Restores state that was previously snapshotted from the provided parameters. Typically the parameters are state  * handles from which the old state is read.  *  * @param state the old state to restore.  */ void restore(@Nullable R state) throws Exception.
